metadata.name: Job Description
metadata.value:
Meet The Team

Hitachi Vantara is seeking to hire an ambitious Software Development Engineer (Test) to work with our global Engineering team playing a vital role in driving the quality process within Pentaho Data Catalog (PDC) product engineering group.

Our team is smart, visionary, supportive and, above all, excited by what we do!  If the idea of applying technology and data automation techniques to solve complex data problems excites you, keep reading, we'd love to hear from you!

What You Will Be Doing

You will be able to understand customer usage models, understand software internals, debug code, automate repetitive tasks, and implement new tools and frameworks needed to streamline PDC quality assurance process.
You will work directly with both Software Developers and Quality Assurance Engineers to understand project features, review technical designs, and implement automated test tools that help deliver quality features with efficiency.
You will be writing automation code that automatically verifies the quality and functionality of the product.

What You Bring To The Team (Qualifications)

Required Bachler's and/or master’s in computer science, Data Science or related STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, & Mathematics) field.
1-2 years’ experience Python, Java, Go, or JavaScript is required
1-2 years’ experience SQL and NoSQL databases (MongoDB a plus) and must have hands on experience querying database
1-2 years’ experience with shell scripting languages i.e., Bash, or PowerShell
1-2 years’ experience in data profiling is a plus i.e., Profile any data Big, or small, whether from RDBMS, Logs, data warehouses or other sources
1-2 experience working with and deploying services within AWS, Azure, and/or GCP cloud.
1-2 years’ experience analyzing Java Garbage Collection (GC) logs, and understanding GC algorithms, memory profiling, etc. is a plus.
Good Understanding of computer science fundamentals and data structures
Excellent analysis and problem-solving skills.

Our Company

Hitachi Vantara is part of the Global Hitachi family. We balance innovation with an open, friendly culture and the backing of a long-established parent company, known for its ethical reputation. We guide customers from what’s now to what’s next by unlocking the value of their data and applications to solve their digital challenges, achieving outcomes that benefit both business and society.

Our people are our biggest asset, they drive our innovation advantage as we strive to offer a flexible and collaborative workplace where they can thrive. Diversity of thought is welcomed, and our employee base is represented by several active Employee Resource Group communities. We offer industry leading benefits packages (flexible working, generous pension, and private healthcare) and promote a creative and inclusive culture. If driving real change gives you a sense of pride and you are passionate about powering social good, we’d love to hear from you.

Our Values

We strive to create an inclusive environment for all and are open to considering home working, compressed/flexible hours, and flexible arrangements. Get in touch with us to explore how we might be able to accommodate your specific needs.

We are proud to say we are an equal opportunity employer and welcome all applicants for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, or disability status. With Japanese roots going back over 100 years, our culture is founded on the values of our parent company expressed as the Hitachi Spirit:

Wa – Harmony, Trust, Respect
Makoto – Sincerity, Fairness, Honesty, Integrity
Kaitakusha-Seishin – Pioneering Spirit, Challenge

Championing diversity, equity, and inclusion 
Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our culture and identity. Diverse thinking, a commitment to allyship, and a culture of empowerment help us achieve powerful results. We want you to be you, with all the ideas, lived experience, and fresh perspective that brings. We support your uniqueness and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our team.
How we look after you
We want to help you take care of your today and tomorrow – at home and at work. Which is why we offer industry-leading benefits that go far beyond compensation. That means support, services, and resources that also take care of your holistic health and wellbeing. We’re always looking for new ways of working that bring out our best, which leads to unexpected ideas. Here, you’ll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with. We’re also champions of life balance and offer flexible arrangements that work for you (role and location dependent).

We’re a global team of innovators. Together, we harness engineering excellence and passion for insight to co-create meaningful solutions to complex challenges. demographic_questions.description:
At Hitachi Vantara, we value the diversity of our workforce and strive to foster an inclusive environment in which talent from all backgrounds can thrive, bringing their unique contributions to our culture and success. We are an equal opportunity employer and seek to strengthen our hiring practices by identifying and mitigating the potential for bias in our assessment and selection processes.

Below is a set of voluntary demographic questions that, if you choose to complete, will provide aggregated data to inform our hiring strategy and help us uphold our commitment to inclusive hiring.  Your responses, or choice to not respond, will in no way be linked to your specific application and will not be used to inform the hiring decision.

Our company does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression or veteran status. In order to track the effectiveness of our recruiting efforts and ensure we consider the needs of all our employees, please consider the following optional questions.
